div.head: 妊娠下黃汁
div.div: discharge of yellow liquid during pregnancy

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: discharge of yellow liquid during pregnancy

sense.def: Alternative Names ren shen xia shui 妊娠下水 , discharge of water during pregnancy. Pathological Condition of vaginal discharge of yellow liquid caused by fetal injury. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shu 秫：食鵝鴨成癥，妊娠下黃汁 , “Consuming geese or ducks generates conglomeration-illness, and discharge of yellow liquid during pregnancy ”.
